category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 11 (Gathering Emblem, Competition Mascot and Competition Slogan)
contents: Article 11 (Competition emblem, competition mascot and competition slogan) In order to promote the competition and express the characteristics of the competition, the organizing committee obtains the competition emblem, competition mascot and competition slogan (including the competition slogan in the case of the National Sports Festival) with prior approval from the Sports Council. ) can be established and used.
